name: Lion
description: The lion is a species in the family Felidae.

name: Elephant
description: The elephant is the largest existing land animal.

name: Tiger
description: The tiger is the largest species among the Felidae.

name: Giraffe
description: The giraffe is an African artiodactyl mammal.

name: Zebra
description: The zebra is a species of African equids.
